title: streetsweeper-app in Docker: npm does not find prisma

comments.author: hayes
comments.text:
Something's wrong with how the Dockerfile is copying prisma files.

When running `docker compose up`:

streetsweeper-app      | npm warn exec The following package was not found and will be installed: prisma@6.19.1

And:
streetsweeper-app      | No migration found in prisma/migrations

title: Auto-renew certbot cert
description: I didn't set up the cron job for cert renewal yet.

title: 7k cities didn't get population matches
description: After running the seed:cities script, about 7,000 cities did not get matched with population data from SimpleMaps. Investigate if there are any quick fixes for better matching (strip out "Town of" or "City of" from names) or if these relations should be in the db at all (the WELS areas in Maine.)

title: Bug: Bolton, MA matched with Boston, MA for population
Implement local city search API endpoint using City table
description: Replace Nominatim-based search with local database search using the City table. Should support fuzzy matching, population-based ranking, and fast autocomplete responses.
